subject: Pickyshop.com Order # {orderId}!
line1: We are sorry to inform you that item you have purchased is not currently available.
line2: Here is a gift, so you will forgive us! You can choose any other item and we will apply anextra %s%% discount.
line3: Enter the folloqing COUPON in your cart to take advantage of your discount!
line4: We would also take the opportunity to get you possible alternatives:
line5: If you will not find any other valid alternative, do not worry, we will proceed to an immediate refund!
line6: Send us your email and we will immediately execute your decision!
line7:
Thanks for choosing us,
See you soon on our e-shop!
